item.title: Checking current status of fail2ban
item.description: 1root@example:/var/log# fail2ban-client status 2Status 3|- Number of jail: 1 4`- Jail list: sshd

item.title: Checking status of specific jail
item.description: 1root@example:/var/log# fail2ban-client status sshd 2Status for the jail: sshd 3|- Filter 4| |- Currently failed: 6 5| |- Total failed: 91801 6| `- File list: /var/log/auth.log 7`- Actions 8|- Currently banned: 1 9|- Total banned: 9971 10`- Banned IP list: 51.15.255.133

item.title: Interesting Read
item.description: Permanent banning of ip - https://nerdily.org/2017/upgrading-fail2ban-to-a-permanent-banhammer/ AbuseDB checking - https://www.abuseipdb.com/check/52.175.24.92
